nodes.text: Baramorra was a temperate, dreary, rainsoaked Imperial Remnant planet governed by Admiral Llon Banjeer's nephew, the "Boss". He employed bounty hunters such as Jahnar-Kooda to keep the populace in line; when the planet's elders objected, he had them killed. The Boss was funded by Grappa the Hutt; when this was revealed, the Boss was executed as a traitor by Kir Kanos.
